name: Geminga
description:
Geminga is a neutron star approximately 250 parsecs (around 800 light years) from the Sun in the constellation Gemini. Its name, attributed by its discoverer Giovanni Bignami, is both a contraction of Gemini gamma-ray source, and a transcription of the words gh'è minga , meaning "it's not there".
Source

------------------------------------

Made for the second 1-Bit Weekend Game Jam!

This should work on most browsers, and is theoretically playable on phone, though it is not recommended.
On some phones the sound appears not to be supported, so for the full experience, use a computer browser.

------------------------------------

Note: Almost all assets were made during the jam. Exceptions include a couple sprites and tileset elements (made ahead of time for engine testing), as well as the title screen (made the night the themes were announced).

The emoting bubbles are edited from default RPG Maker. With more time they would've been replaced, but it was low priority.

------------------------------------
